mapper.select: select te.id,te.name,te.url,te.create_user,tu.profile_photo from tb_emoji te left outer join tb_user tu on te.create_user = tu.id left outer join emoji_tag et on te.id = et.emoji_id where et.tag_id=#{staticId}

select te.id,te.name,te.url,te.create_user,tu.profile_photo from tb_emoji te left outer join tb_user tu on te.create_user = tu.id left outer join emoji_tag et on te.id = et.emoji_id where et.tag_id=#{dynamicId}
select te.id,te.name,te.url,te.create_user,tu.profile_photo from tb_emoji te left outer join tb_user tu on te.create_user = tu.id where te.create_time>#{sevenDaysAgo} order by te.create_time desc
